welcome_message_body: Welcome to Des Plaines, where small-town charm meets big-city convenience. Known for its historic downtown, beautiful parks, and diverse dining options, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium high-speed WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport serves as the gateway for international flights and offers customs and immigration services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Midway Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Midway Airport, primarily serving Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport houses all check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Dupage County Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
